display_html: type Pair n = (n, n)
name: Pair

display_html: type NodeId = Int
name: NodeId

display_html: type EdgeId = Pair NodeId
name: EdgeId

display_html: type With i v = (i, v)
name: With

display_html: type NWith n = With NodeId n
name: NWith

display_html: type EWith e = With EdgeId e
name: EWith

display_html:
data Direction
  • = Directed
  • | Undirected
name: Direction Undirected Directed

display_html:
class Directing (d :: Direction) where
  • ppair :: Proxy d -> NodeId -> NodeId -> EdgeId
  • pisSource :: Proxy d -> NodeId -> EdgeId -> Bool
  • pisSink :: Proxy d -> NodeId -> EdgeId -> Bool
  • pdirection :: Proxy d -> Direction
name: Directing pdirection pisSink pisSource ppair

display_html: opposite :: NodeId -> EdgeId -> Maybe NodeId
name: opposite

display_html: opposite' :: NodeId -> EdgeId -> NodeId
name: opposite'

display_html:
class Unwrap i w => Wrap i v w where
  • wrap :: i -> v -> w
  • wfoldr :: Foldable f => (i -> v -> r -> r) -> r -> f w -> r
name: Wrap wfoldr wrap

display_html:
class Unwrap i w where
  • unwrap :: w -> i
name: Unwrap unwrap

display_html:
class (Directing d, Wrap NodeId n n', Unwrap NodeId n', Wrap EdgeId e e', Unwrap EdgeId e') => Graph g n n' e e' d | g -> n n' e e' d where
  • pair :: g -> NodeId -> NodeId -> EdgeId
  • isSource :: g -> NodeId -> EdgeId -> Bool
  • isSink :: g -> NodeId -> EdgeId -> Bool
  • direction :: g -> Direction
  • nodeCount :: g -> Int
  • edgeCount :: g -> Int
  • removeEdge :: NodeId -> NodeId -> g -> g
  • getNode :: NodeId -> g -> n'
  • getNodeValue :: NodeId -> g -> n
  • getEdge :: EdgeId -> g -> e'
  • getEdgeValue :: EdgeId -> g -> e
  • nodes :: (Cons (t n') (t n') n' n', Monoid (t n')) => g -> t n'
  • edges :: (Cons (t e') (t e') e' e', Monoid (t e')) => g -> t e'
  • nodeMap :: (Cons (t r) (t r) r r, Monoid (t r)) => (n' -> r) -> g -> t r
  • edgeMap :: (Cons (t r) (t r) r r, Monoid (t r)) => (e' -> r) -> g -> t r
  • adjMap :: (Cons (t r) (t r) r r, Monoid (t r)) => (n' -> e' -> r) -> NodeId -> g -> Maybe (t r)
  • adjNodeMap :: (Cons (t r) (t r) r r, Monoid (t r)) => (n' -> r) -> NodeId -> g -> Maybe (t r)
  • adjFoldl :: (r -> n' -> e' -> r) -> r -> NodeId -> g -> Maybe r
  • adjNodeFoldl :: (r -> n' -> r) -> r -> NodeId -> g -> Maybe r
  • adjFoldlM :: Monad m => (r -> n' -> e' -> m r) -> r -> NodeId -> g -> MaybeT m r
  • adjForM_ :: Monad m => NodeId -> g -> (n' -> e' -> m r) -> MaybeT m ()
  • degree :: NodeId -> g -> Maybe Int
name: Graph degree adjForM_ adjFoldlM adjNodeFoldl adjFoldl adjNodeMap adjMap edgeMap nodeMap nodes getEdgeValue getEdge getNodeValue removeEdge edgeCount nodeCount direction isSink isSource getNode edges pair

display_html:
class Builder g n e | g -> n e where
  • assoc :: (Foldable f1, Foldable f2, Wrap NodeId n n', Wrap EdgeId e e') => f1 n' -> f2 e' -> g
  • build :: (Traversable t1, Traversable t2) => t1 NodeId -> (NodeId -> n) -> t2 EdgeId -> (NodeId -> NodeId -> e) -> g
name: Builder assoc build

display_html: propagate :: forall d n n' g e e' a m s. (Graph g n n' e e' d, PrimMonad m, Pointed s, Foldable s, Monoid (s NodeId)) => (e' -> Double) -> g -> (s NodeId -> s NodeId -> a -> a) -> a -> MonadGen m -> StateT (s NodeId, s NodeId) m a
name: propagate

display_html: propagateUntil :: forall d n n' g e e' a m s. (Graph g n n' e e' d, Pointed s, Foldable s, Monoid (s NodeId)) => (e' -> Double) -> g -> (s NodeId -> s NodeId -> a -> a) -> (a -> Bool) -> s NodeId -> a -> Int -> (a, (s NodeId, s NodeId))
name: propagateUntil

name: adjacencyMatrix

name: degreeMatrix

display_html:
data G nc n n' ec e e' (d :: Direction) = G {
  • nid :: !Int
  • nc :: !Int
  • ec :: !Int
  • ns :: !(nc n)
  • es :: !(ec e)
  • prx :: Proxy d
}
name: G G prx nid ec nc ns es

display_html: type VGr n e = G (Map NodeId) n (NWith n) (HashMap EdgeId) e (EWith e)
name: VGr

display_html: type DiVGr n e = VGr n e Directed
name: DiVGr

display_html: type UndiVGr n e = VGr n e Undirected
name: UndiVGr

display_html: type NVGr n = G (Map NodeId) n (NWith n) Set EdgeId EdgeId
name: NVGr

display_html: type DiNVGr n = NVGr n Directed
name: DiNVGr

display_html: type UndiNVGr n = NVGr n Undirected
name: UndiNVGr

display_html: type EVGr e = G Set NodeId NodeId (HashMap EdgeId) e (EWith e)
name: EVGr

display_html: type DiEVGr e = EVGr e Directed
name: DiEVGr

display_html: type UndiEVGr e = EVGr e Undirected
name: UndiEVGr

display_html: type Gr = G Set NodeId NodeId Set EdgeId EdgeId
name: Gr

display_html: type DiGr = Gr Directed
name: DiGr

display_html: type UndiGr = Gr Undirected
name: UndiGr

display_html: type MapGr n e = VGr n e

name: _adjCombinator

name: oppositeV'

display_html: filterWithSource :: (SemiFilterable EdgeId ec e, Directing d) => Proxy d -> ec e -> NodeId -> ec e
name: filterWithSource

display_html: _adjFCombinator :: (SemiFoldable NodeId nc n, SemiIndexable NodeId nc n, SemiFilterable EdgeId ec e, Directing d, Wrap EdgeId e e', Wrap NodeId n n') => Proxy d -> nc n -> ec e -> ((a -> EdgeId -> e -> b) -> q -> ec e -> r) -> (a -> n' -> e' -> b) -> q -> NodeId -> Maybe r
name: _adjFCombinator

display_html: _adjMCombinator :: (SemiFoldable NodeId nc n, SemiIndexable NodeId nc n, SemiFilterable EdgeId ec e, Directing d, Wrap EdgeId e e', Wrap NodeId n n') => Proxy d -> nc n -> ec e -> ((EdgeId -> e -> b) -> ec e -> r) -> (n' -> e' -> b) -> NodeId -> Maybe r
name: _adjMCombinator

display_html:
class Foldable f => SemiFoldable i f v where
  • selem :: i -> f v -> Bool
  • sfoldl :: (r -> i -> v -> r) -> r -> f v -> r
  • sfoldr :: (i -> v -> r -> r) -> r -> f v -> r
  • sfoldlM :: Monad m => (r -> i -> v -> m r) -> r -> f v -> m r
  • sforM_ :: Monad m => f v -> (i -> v -> m r) -> m ()
  • convert :: (Monoid (t r), Cons (t r) (t r) r r) => (i -> v -> r) -> f v -> t r
name: SemiFoldable sforM_ sfoldlM sfoldl sfoldr selem convert

display_html:
class SemiFilterable i f v where
  • sfilter :: (i -> Bool) -> f v -> f v
name: SemiFilterable sfilter

display_html:
class SemiIndexable i t v where
  • sindex :: t v -> i -> v
name: SemiIndexable sindex

display_html:
class SemiTraversable i t v where
  • sfor :: Applicative f => t v -> (i -> v -> f r) -> f (t r)
  • sforM :: Monad m => t v -> (i -> v -> m r) -> m (t r)
name: SemiTraversable sforM sfor

display_html: type SemiWitherable i t v = (SemiFoldable i t v, SemiFilterable i t v, SemiTraversable i t v)
name: SemiWitherable

display_html: type SemiFFI i t v = (SemiFoldable i t v, SemiFilterable i t v, SemiIndexable i t v)
name: SemiFFI

display_html:
class (Foldable nc, Monoid (nc n)) => NodeBuilderBase nc n where
  • _nassoc' :: (Foldable f, Wrap NodeId n n', SemiFoldable EdgeId ec e) => f n' -> ec e -> (Int, Int, nc n)
name: NodeBuilderBase _nassoc'

display_html:
class (Monoid (ec e), SemiFoldable EdgeId ec e) => EdgeBuilderBase d ec e where
  • _eassoc' :: (Foldable f, Wrap EdgeId e e') => Proxy d -> f e' -> (Int, ec e)
name: EdgeBuilderBase _eassoc'

display_html: _cnassoc' :: (Foldable f, Foldable nc, Monoid (nc NodeId), Wrap NodeId NodeId n', SemiFoldable EdgeId ec e, Cons (nc NodeId) (nc NodeId) NodeId NodeId) => f n' -> ec e -> (Int, Int, nc NodeId)
name: _cnassoc'

display_html: _nassoc :: (Foldable f, Foldable nc, Monoid (nc n), Wrap NodeId n n', SemiFoldable EdgeId ec e) => (NodeId -> n -> nc n -> nc n) -> (NodeId -> nc n -> nc n) -> f n' -> ec e -> (Int, Int, nc n)
name: _nassoc

display_html: _eassoc :: (Directing d, Foldable f, Monoid (ec e), SemiFoldable EdgeId ec e, Wrap EdgeId e e') => Proxy d -> (EdgeId -> e -> ec e -> ec e) -> f e' -> (Int, ec e)
name: _eassoc
